verses.verse: His <S%H5520>tabernacle<s%> is also in <S%H8004>Salem;<s%> His dwelling <S%H4585>place<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
There he <S%H7665>broke<s%> the flaming <S%H7565>arrows<s%> of the <S%H7565>bow,<s%> the <S%H4043>shield,<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the weapons of <S%H4421>war.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H215>Glorious<s%> are <S%H117>you,<s%> and excellent, more than <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of <S%H2964>game.<s%>

<S%H47>Valiant<s%> men lie <S%H7997>plundered,<s%> they have <S%H5123>slept<s%> their last <S%H8142>sleep.<s%> None of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>war<s%> can <S%H4672>lift<s%> their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
At your <S%H1606>rebuke,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> both <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and <S%H5483>horse<s%> are cast into a deep <S%H7290>sleep.<s%>
<S%H3372>You,<s%> even you, are to be feared. Who can <S%H5975>stand<s%> in your <S%H6440>sight<s%> <S%H227>when<s%> you are <S%H639>angry?<s%>
when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> all the <S%H6035>afflicted<s%> ones of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Surely the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3034>praises<s%> <S%H7611>you.<s%> The survivors of your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> are <S%H2296>restrained.<s%>

Make <S%H5087>vows<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7999>fulfill<s%> <S%H5439>them!<s%> Let all of his neighbors <S%H2986>bring<s%> <S%H7862>presents<s%> to him who is to be <S%H4172>feared.<s%>
He will cut <S%H1219>off<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H5057>princes.<s%> He is <S%H3372>feared<s%> by the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
